Others: Aaron Ramsey and Rubin Colwill have been included in Wales’ squad for the start of their UEFA Nations League campaign.
Jesper Daland has earned a call-up for Norway.
Callum Robinson and Callum O’Dowda have been selected by the Republic of Ireland.
Manolis Siopis has been called up to feature for Greece.
Ethan Horvath has been selected in the squad for the United States of America.
Jamilu Collins has been selected in Nigeria's squad.
This international window will see many young Bluebirds feature for Wales’ age-grade sides.
